info.name: Uptobox x Adblock
info.description:
The fastest way to skip anti-adblocker on uptobox.com. Now includes go4up.com.

Works with Stylish for Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Safari. Opera Chromium users, install Stylish from this thread.

This style won't work if it's installed as user script. If you prefer using user script, install Uptobox Adblocker-Blocker Blocker user script (Greasemonkey only) by Watilin.
